name: Wolvic
abstract: Wolvic is an open source browser that opens a portal to the Web and all it has to offer, including immersive games, videos, and environments built for XR.

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Russian, Japanese, French, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
Highlights:
- Immersive videos can be reoriented along the vertical axis
- Clearer resizing logic
- B/Y buttons can go back to the previous page
- Supports Huawei Vision Glass
- Many bugfixes and stability improvements

UI:
- Long press Home to reorient videos on supported pages
- Improved resizing logic with max/min boundaries
- Suggested URL preserved when typing in URL bar
- Dialogs and keyboards are now flat and user-oriented
- Fixed recentering and headlock issues
- Permission request explanations (HVR China)

Input:
- B/Y buttons navigate back outside WebXR
- Full range hand motion for better tracking

Content:
- Websites like Google Meet, Soundcloud, etc, ensured to work
- Wolvic restarts after Mozilla account sign-out

Huawei Vision Glass:
- AR glasses support, with phone as controller

Others:
- Autogenerated app version codes
- Less frequent battery level refresh for enhanced battery life
- Removed passthrough layer when in WebXR
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4E, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
